document_data.name: Lord Briarbroke
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Briarbroke''' was a nobleman from [[Cormyr]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.History:
He attended the [[Council of the Dragon]] in late [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}, where he was unfortunately among those that died after steel was drawn on King [[Foril Obarskyr I]]. His body was later taken to the [[Chapel of the Valiant]] and identified.

One of the [[War Wizards]], [[Welwyn Tracegar]], characterized his death as "not much loss".{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|138|15}}
